children: Boundary Padded Arrays  These are returned by boundary condition operators.
#an array of dimension M = N-1, used to extend the lower index boundary
The padded_arrays must cover every dimension - make sure that the number of padded_arrays is equal to ndims(u).
There are multiple Arrays that extend along dimension
- make sure every dimension has a unique extension
The padded_arrays do not all extend the same u!
A colon on the extended dim is as yet incompatible with additional colons
#as yet no support for range indexing or colon indexing
